      • SimilarityMatrix

        public SimilarityMatrix(SentenceList sentenceList,
                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> rareWords,
                Options opt)
        Instantiate a new similarities matrix with a list of sentences and a set of rare words to be used in the calculation
        Parameters:
        sentenceList - Contains a the SentenceList
        rareWords - contains words that will be considered when comparing sentences
        opt - Options, which should be applied

    • Method Detail

      • calculateSimilarity

        public void calculateSimilarity()
        Computes all similarities from the given sentenceList Must not be called more than once.

      • calculateSimilarity

        private float calculateSimilarity(Sentence s1,
                        Sentence s2)
        Computes a simple similarity between two sentences. The similarity is the quotient of the length from both sentences
        Parameters:
        s1 - Sentence One
        s2 - Sentence Two
        Returns:
        Similarity between the given sentences

      • similarityDistribution

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Double> similarityDistribution(int granularity)
        Calculates the normalized similarity distribution of this matrix
        Parameters:
        granularity - the number of data points to be calculated for this distribution
        Returns:
        List of normalized frequencies
